properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
VESSEL, 250 PERSONS ON BOARD, CAPSIZED AND ADRIFT
IN 34-28N 012-41E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC MALTA, PHONE: 356 215 7267,
FAX: 356 2180 9860, E-MAIL: RCCMALTA@GOV.MT
OR MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT,
UFFICIO3.REPARTO3@MIT.GOV.IT,
CGCP3REP4@MIT.GOV.IT.
